scripts.generate: DATABASE_URL=$(npm run db:url --silent 2>/dev/null | tr -d '\n') prisma generate
scripts.migrate: DATABASE_URL=$(npm run db:url --silent 2>/dev/null | tr -d '\n') prisma migrate dev
scripts.migrate:reset: DATABASE_URL=$(npm run db:url --silent 2>/dev/null | tr -d '\n') prisma migrate reset
scripts.serve: DATABASE_URL=$(npm run db:url --silent 2>/dev/null | tr -d '\n') node dist/setup.js --serve --root ../../
scripts.postinstall: npm run generate && npm run migrate && pnpm monoapp-setup @monodog/monoapp --root $INIT_CWD
